text: @StonebridgeLock @CanalRiverTrust @E17Wetlands @EnvAgency @sianberry Oh dear. Many boaters feed the swans and attract them where they should not go. And in fact the RSPB advise feeding swans is a very bad idea. And I am a boater so I know well what goes on.

@StonebridgeLock @CanalRiverTrust @E17Wetlands @EnvAgency @sianberry So relieved that the swan was rescued by great local community working together. The footage of the #trappedswan was horrific -very upsetting. Hope repair will be done swiftly, with proper regard to wildlife.
